Jowfe Oil Technology (JOT) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọrụ mmanụ ala nke gọọmentị ndi obodo Libya na-enye kemịkalụ mmanụ na ngwá ọrụ igwu ala
E hiwere JOT na afo 1983 ma debanye aha n'okpuru nọmba 7102 dịka ụlọ ọrụ  nke National Oil Corporation (NOC).
Nkà na ụzụ mmanụ Jowfe na-etinye aka na mmepụta na ahịa nke kemịkal mmanụ na Obodo Libya na mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu

Ndị injinia apịtị na mmanụ ala nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ọrụ teknụzụ maka igwu olulu mmiri gụnyere: Ịkwadebe atụmatụ igwu ala dị ka akụkọ ndị na-ahụ maka ala si kwuo; (2) eriri waya na atụmatụ mmepụta; ngwá ọrụ na-ehicha apịtị, onye na-eme ka oghere dị nro, tubing mmepụta na nyocha teknụzụ; ọrụ ala iji chọpụta omini na-ụdị nke oghere nwere hydrocarbons ya na gas; ihe ndị na-egwu mmiri, ire, igwu ala, ihe, ndị na-ekewa mmanụ, akara ọrụ silk, ya na nnwale ogwe osisi.
Jowfe nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe atọ na-emepụta kemịkal ya na ihe maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
Ihe ndị a gụnyere mmiri na-egwu ana na ihe ndi ọgwụgwọ, kemịkal eji emepụta nhicha, ágbá na ihe na-arapara n'ahụ
